Cupertino.Nvidia: Nvidia Corporation ( in-VID-eeə; most commonly referred to as Nvidia, stylized as NVIDIA, nVIDIA or nVidia) is an American technology company incorporated in Delaware and based in Santa Clara, California. It designs graphics processing units (GPUs) for the gaming, cryptocurrency, and professional markets, as well as system on a chip units (SoCs) for the mobile computing and automotive market. Its primary GPU product line, labeled "GeForce", is in direct competition with Advanced Micro Devices' (AMD) "Radeon" products.
